name: Computer Science
details: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of computer science.

name: Data Structures
details: Explore advanced data structures and algorithms used in computer science.

name: Web Development
details: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Machine Learning
details: Get started with machine learning and explore its applications.

name: Database Management
details: Learn about database design, SQL, and database management.

name: Software Engineering
details: Explore software engineering best practices and methodologies.

name: Computer Networks
details: Learn about computer networking and network protocols.

name: Artificial Intelligence
details: Explore the field of artificial intelligence and its applications.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
details: Learn about cybersecurity concepts and practices.
